author: bayard
msg: AbstractStringTag renamed to StringTagSupport to be more inline with the
JSTL. This highlights that this class is useful to anyone wanting
to make their own String changing tags.
All tags changed to extend the new class.

author: bayard
msg: Bug submitted by Jim Lerner. Non-alphabetical text was replaced with the
previous alphabetical character and not left alone. ie)

author: bayard
msg: Changed SKIP_BODY to EVAL_PAGE in the endTag method. It is illegal of me
to use SKIP_BODY in a doEndTag method.

author: bayard
msg: Made the start attribute of substring to be not required.

author: bayard
msg: Made the default start to be '0', so an end can be specified on its own.
Stopped the default end being '-1' as the underlying implementation no longer
